text: 4.14 Ais 28.9, 1 Ko 14.20, 2 Ko 2.17, Hib 13.9 Gak adek anɨb ak mɨdon agɨl, ñapay sɨkol tek ma yonɨgun. Ñapay tek ma mɨdon nɨm, bɨ God takaw agobun agɨl yepɨs apal okok, kɨli yɨgen dɨl ñɨg solwala pagup tek ak chɨnop ma gɨnɨgabal. Kɨli bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop yepɨs agel takaw yepɨs anɨb okok nɨŋɨd kɨdek gelak ak pen,
